summary: Derry, also known as Londonderry, is the second-largest city in Northern Ireland. It's located on the River Foyle with two road bridges and one footbridge connecting both sides. The city has a population of over 85,000 people and is a major cultural center, having been the UK's City of Culture in 2013. It's close to the border with County Donegal in Ireland, and tradition holds that it was founded by Saint Colmcille. Derry is known for its historic walled city and is an important port and airport hub.
title: Derry
